title: PrepXtra Game of the Week: Loudon at CAK
text:
Facebook Email Twitter Google+ LinkedIn Pinterest PrepXtra Game of the Week: Loudon at CAK The No. 2 team in class AAA is set to take on a team trying to get back to .500 on Friday night in the Prep Xtra Game of the Week. Post to Facebook PrepXtra Game of the Week: Loudon at CAK The No. 2 team in class AAA is set to take on a team trying to get back to .500 on Friday night in the Prep Xtra Game of the Week.  //on.wbir.com/1RjQHEp   Join the Conversation To   PrepXtra Game of the Week: Loudon at CAK WBIR Staff, WBIR 5:57 a.m. EDT October 2, 2015 #PrepXtra CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
(WBIR – KNOXVILLE) The No. 2 team in class AAA is set to take on a team trying to get back to .500 on Friday night in the Prep Xtra Game of the Week. 
The Christian Academy of Knoxville (CAK) Warriors (6-0) will host the Loudon Redskins (2-3) on Friday night. 
The last time these two teams played was in 2012, when CAK won 56-21. 
After having a great year in 2014, Loudon is struggling with just two wins against Sweetwater and Greenback. 
Last season Loudon made it deep into the playoffs before losing to Fulton. 
The Redskins have had to replace Josh Jackson, who set the record for most touchdowns in a season in school history. 
After 13 seasons with the Reskins, Loudon’s coach Jeff Harig left for the head coaching job at West High School. Joe Campbell replaces Harig. Campbell came over from Midway. 
Kickoff is 7:30 p.m. Friday at CAK. You can also catch the game on 10News2, and online at WBIR.com . Read or Share this story: http://on.wbir.com/1RjQHEp TOP VIDEOS
